description:
Uesugi Kenshin is not the only one seeking Nobunaga`s down fall. The monk, Kennyo, also seeks revenge on Nobunaga and, thanks to some help from Akechi Mitsuhide, manages to sneak into Azuchi Castle. Things seem to be going smoothly until the attic he has snuck into turns out to be much more heavily fortified than he was led to believe.
Source: crunchyroll
